column3: Latest;Sihanoukville: A Chinese man was arrested for drug dealing at 1 pm on Sunday 3 May 2020.------According to information from the Criminal Police Bureau officer
column4: said the suspect was named YANG Xing
column7: China.------He was found with 9 packets of meth
column9: and something which appears to be a synthetic cannabinoid (known as spice).  The suspect broke his phone during a chase. A Highlander car was also seized. ------NKD
